sentence.Network_en: I was distraught and let out a bellow of tearful rage.
sentence.Network_cn: 我心烦意乱，流着眼泪发了一通火。

sentence.Network_en: Her distraught mother had spent all night waiting by the phone.
sentence.Network_cn: 她母亲忧心如焚,在电话旁守了一个晚上.

sentence.Network_en: Weeks after the accident she remained distraught.
sentence.Network_cn: 事故过去几周了,可她仍是心神不安.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 字根字尾构词法.doc - 豆丁网 ... distort 扭曲,曲解 distraught 心神分散,发狂的 distress 穷困,困难,痛苦.
卡通人物真人秀(1)- 双语新闻 - 21英语网 ... craze 狂热 distraught 心烦意乱的 lament 悲叹.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... fraught 充满 distraught 心神狂乱的 plait 发辫，编成辫.
英语文学分析常用词汇_人生感悟_百度空间 ... dissipated 放荡的 distraught 心神错乱的；发狂的 distrustful 不信任的，疑心重的.

list.abs: She is very distraught I think that she needs to be alone ., 她非常心烦意乱 , 我想她需要独自一人静一静.
i suppose i was a bit distraught ., 我想我有些发狂了.
distraught parents cling to each other on the sofa . flanked by frowning detectives , the couple stare at their phone waiting for the kidnappers to call .焦急的父母紧紧依偎在沙发上，周围是愁眉苦脸的侦探，老两口紧盯着电话机等绑匪的电话。
an unnaturally frenzied or distraught woman ., 一个不同寻常的狂热的或发狂的女人.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: alteration of the obsolete adjective distract (from Latin distractus 'pulled apart'), influenced by straught, archaic past participle of stretch

entry.tran: 心烦意乱的;心急如焚的;发狂的
entry.def: If someone is distraught, they are so upset and worried that they cannot think clearly.

example.ex: His distraught parents were being comforted by relatives.
example.tran: 亲戚们正在安慰他那心急如焚的父母。

auth_sentence.content: Miss Edkins' family were distraught, he added.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Miss Edkins' family were distraught, he added.

auth_sentence.content: Russell Crowe stars as the distraught and determined husband.

auth_sentence.content: The boss came out of the meeting visibly distraught.
auth_sentence.res_content: The boss came out of the meeting visibly distraught.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The boss came out of the meeting visibly distraught.

means.word_mean: 忧心如焚的;心神错乱的;几乎发狂的

sentences.en: Her distraught mother had spent all night waiting by the phone.
sentences.cn: 她母亲忧心如焚，在电话旁守了一个晚上。
听上去她完全心慌意乱。
